toolInfo.name: Asthma Symptom Checker
toolInfo.description: Assessment tool for asthma-related breathing symptoms

questions.question: How often do you experience wheezing or whistling sounds when breathing?
Do you experience shortness of breath during normal activities?

options.text: Even during light activity or at rest

questions.question: How often do you have a persistent cough, especially at night?
Do you feel chest tightness or pressure?
Do specific triggers worsen your breathing (dust, pollen, exercise, cold air)?
How often do breathing problems interfere with your sleep?
Do you use quick-relief inhalers or have needed emergency treatment for breathing problems?

low.title: Low Asthma Risk
low.description: Your symptoms suggest a low likelihood of asthma. However, continue monitoring your respiratory health.
low.recommendations: Maintain good respiratory health through regular exercise, avoiding known irritants, and practicing good hygiene. If symptoms develop or worsen, consider reassessment.
nextSteps: Consider allergy testing if symptoms develop
Consult healthcare provider if symptoms worsen

medium.title: Possible Asthma Symptoms
medium.description: Your symptoms suggest possible asthma or other respiratory condition that warrants medical evaluation.
medium.recommendations: Schedule an appointment with your healthcare provider for proper evaluation. Keep track of symptoms and potential triggers to discuss during your visit.
nextSteps: Keep a symptom diary noting triggers
Learn proper inhaler technique if prescribed
Develop an asthma action plan with your doctor

high.title: High Asthma Risk
high.description: Your symptoms strongly suggest asthma or another serious respiratory condition requiring immediate medical attention.
high.recommendations: Seek prompt medical evaluation from a healthcare provider or pulmonologist. If experiencing severe breathing difficulties, seek emergency care immediately.
nextSteps: Contact emergency services if having severe breathing difficulty
See a pulmonologist for specialized care
Get proper asthma testing and diagnosis
